cleaned_text: Plant Powered Pain Relief Our Traditional family remedy offers natural relief from tension, pain, bruising and inflammation. Trusted by some of the worlds best practitioners at The Ancient Cedars Spa. Handcrafted home and body products with naturally effective ingredients. We continue with our small batch standards, a slow process rooted in tradition. It is a joy to share the abundance of nutrient rich wild elements found here on the west coast with you. You'll find our ingredient lists are very simple, making it easy to know what's inside. 100% natural ingredients, Organic botanicals from our garden, locally wild foraged botanicals, 100% vegan ingredients (except our lip balms, they contain Beeswax), Plant based, food grade cold pressed oils, pure essential oils, GMO free soy wax, Coconut wax, recyclable, biodegradable and reusable packaging (always glass. never plastic.) organic, wild crafted & ethical ingredients
